Welcome to lkab_slag_ai’s documentation!¶

Quick start guide:

  1. Copy image data from LKCAMADM01 to the /data/image/excerpt… folder using the copynth_recursive Powershell script
  2. Copy process data CSV’s to the /data/process/KK4 folder
  3. Go to the scripts folder and start running scripts

Suggested order of running scripts:

  1. daily_to_cont in the image folder unless the image set is already continuous (i.e., not in separate daily folders).
  2. db_script to create and populate the process database from the CSV’s.
  3. generate_in_memory_process_data_array to save the process data array.
  4. train_discriminator_network to train the discriminator network. This network will help in producing the temporally averaged images.
  5. filter_images to get the temporally averaged images.
  6. here you can create or add your own training images.
  7. train_segmenter_network to train the segmenter network.
  8. extract_slag_signal to get the slag signal. You may need to rerun db_script to put this into the database (optional).
  9. train_process_model to train the process model.
  10. sensitivity_analysis to visualize results from the process model.

Otherwise, explore the documentation of the modules below.
